q: Simon Cowell will hand out$ 5 mil Posted by James Lileks Not his own money, of course. By the way, what exactly this show and Idol? Acerbic British music judge and entrepreneur Simon Cowell said on Monday that the winner of the first U.S. version of the television singing competition, "The X Factor, will receive a$ 5 million record deal."
